column5: In another post this was stated in a link that was put up there. You don't need that this summer ,do you? I haven't heard anything but a passport needed in 07 or 08.
This summer you will need nothing more than a photo i.d. and proof of citizenship (birth certificate or passport).
You might as well start applying now and avoid the rush for a passport,knowing how governments work they will not be prepared for the number of applications. Just look at New Orleans. Greg
In the past all I had was my photo drives license.....is that still good enough. I never have taken my birth certificate?

In the long run it's easier to ruin the hundred bucks and get a passport. Eventually you'll need it to get back into the country reguardless where you go. I got mine five years ago for Canada and its a lot easier at the border to hand the officer a stack of passports for the whole group then have everyone digging out thier wallets.
Passport??? Why would we do that..that would make sense. :)
Actually, the price of a US Passport (today) is around $127. Since the US has 12 million illeagles, why can't you just tell US Customs you're Juan Alvarez and get in "free".

>Actually, the price of a US Passport (today) is around $127. >Since the US has 12 million illeagles, why can't you just tell >US Customs you're Juan Alvarez and get in "free". > Manual Labor always works for me.
If we could get all those jokers that are here breaking the law to buy a passports we might just lower the debt a little. A passport is good for ten years. Mine is good for that lenght of time.
